title: Authors and Citation

title: Authors and Citation
text: Cao T, Liu C (2025). spiralizePlus: ​Object-Oriented Additive Operator-Based Spiralization. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://github.com/caotianze/spiralizePlus.
code: @Manual{,   title = {spiralizePlus: ​Object-Oriented and Additive Operator-Based Spiralization},   author = {Tianze Cao and Chen Liu},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://github.com/caotianze/spiralizePlus}, }

title: ​Object-Oriented and Additive Operator-Based Spiralization
text: spiralizePlus provides object-oriented interface extension ‘spiralize’ package. implements modular architecture spiral visualization components (axes, tracks, layers, etc.) encapsulated R S4 objects class-specific methods. Users construct complex spiral plots combining components additive operators (+) declarative syntax.

title: Addition rules in spiralizePlus — addition-rules
text: spPlot(contain n spTracks)+spTrack=spPlot(contain n+1 spTracks),n>=0  spTrak(contain n spTrakGeoms)+spTrackGeom=spTrack(contain n+1 spTrackGeoms),n>=0

title: Addition rules in spiralizePlus — addition-rules
code: # S4 method for class 'spPlot,spTrack' e1 + e2  # S4 method for class 'spTrack,spTrackGeom' e1 + e2

title: Addition rules in spiralizePlus — addition-rules
text: e1 object defined spiralizePlus e2 object defined spiralizePlus

title: S4 class spPlot — spPlot-class
text: initMode character. can following values: "initialize", "initialize_by_gcoor", "initialize_by_time". initParams list. named list stores parameters function called backend. Based value initMode, backend function one following four:spiralize::spiral_initialize, spiralize::spiral_initialize_by_gcoor, spiralize::spiral_initialize_by_time. tracks list. list spTrack stored. clear logical. Whether call spiralize::spiral_clear drawing.

title: S4 class spTrack — spTrack-class
text: func character. Normally "spiral_track". params list. named list stores parameters function called backend. trackGeoms list. list spTrackGeom stored.

title: S4 class spTrackGeom — spTrackGeom-class
text: Objectified representation R package spiralize's plotting functions corresponding parameters track level.

title: S4 class spTrackGeom — spTrackGeom-class
text: func character. name plot function R package spiralize params list. named list stores parameters function called backend.
